verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5023>this<s%> I <S%G1492>looked<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, a <S%G2374>door<s%> was <S%G455>opened<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> was as it <S%G5613>were<s%> of a <S%G4536>trumpet<s%> <S%G2980>talking<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>; which <S%G3004>said<s%>, Come <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G3326>hereafter<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> I <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, a <S%G2362>throne<s%> was <S%G2749>set<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> one <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> to look <S%G3706>upon<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G2393>jasper<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G4555>sardine<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> there was a <S%G2463>rainbow<s%> round <S%G2943>about<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, in <S%G3706>sight<s%> like <S%G3664>to<s%> an <S%G4664>emerald<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> round <S%G2943>about<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> were <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G2362>seats<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2362>seats<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%>, <S%G4016>clothed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2440>clothes<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> <S%G4735>crowns<s%> of <S%G5552>gold<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> <S%G1607>proceeded<s%> <S%G796>lightnings<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1027>thunderings<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> there were <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2985>lamps<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2545>burning<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> there was a <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>mirror<s%> like <S%G3664>to<s%> <S%G2930>crystal<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> round <S%G2945>about<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, were <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>creatures<s%> full <S%G1073>of<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3693>behind<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> was <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G3023>lion<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G3448>calf<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> was <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G4072>flying<s%> <S%G105>eagle<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>creatures<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G303%G99999>each<s%> of <S%G1438>them<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G4420>wings<s%> <S%G2943>about<s%> <S%G2532>him<s%>; and they were <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G2081>inside<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G372%G99999>rest<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G40>Holy<s%>, <S%G40>holy<s%>, <S%G40>holy<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3841>Almighty<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5607>is<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> is to <S%G2064>come<s%>.

The <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> fall <S%G4098>down<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G3588>him<s%> that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G3588>him<s%> that <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4735>crowns<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>,

You <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%>, O <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, to <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> have <S%G2936>created<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2307>pleasure<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G2936>created<s%>.
